item.title: i deleted my previous github acc but i still have the codes of the 20 old projects locally
best quotes of from my favorite BL novel (updating ✨)
item.description:
/

“
“…” said Feng Xin.
“…” said Mu Qing.
“…?” said Quan Yizhen.
“Ho ho,” said Pei Ming.”
― Mò Xiāng Tóng Xiù, Heaven Official’s Blessing: Tian Guan Ci Fu (Novel), Vol. 1

/

“Xie Lian didn’t know whether to laugh or cry.”
― Mò Xiāng Tóng Xiù, Heaven Official’s Blessing: Tian Guan Ci Fu (Novel), Vol. 1

/

“If I like you, you could be a beggar and I’d still like you. If I dislike you, you could be the emperor and I’d still dislike you. Shouldn’t it be like that? It’s simple logic, so whether you’re human or not is irrelevant.”
― Mò Xiāng Tóng Xiù, Heaven Official’s Blessing: Tian Guan Ci Fu (Novel), Vol. 1
